headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  SOBIN, VERA L.

lead_paragraph: SOBIN--Vera L.,88, Born Tientsin, China. Died New York City, May 9, 2014. Beloved wife of Dr. Allan Sobin. Dear mother of Rodney (Rebecca), Joseph (Robin), James Baker (Nancy). Loving grandmother of Ethan and Amelia. Rest in peace. Donations in Vera's memory may be made to Town & Village Synagogue, 334 E. 14 St., NY, NY 10003.
